# Altruist

## Overview

| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Website** | [altruist.com](https://altruist.com/) |
| **Category** | Custodian / Wealth Management Platform / RIA Technology |
| **Description** | Altruist is a modern, AI-forward custodian and wealth management platform built specifically for independent financial advisors. The company provides an all-in-one solution that combines custodial services, portfolio management, billing, reporting, and AI-powered tools to help RIAs streamline operations and serve clients more efficiently. |

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Name | Monthly/Annual Cost | Key Features |
|------|------|---------------------|--------------|
| **Starter** | Altruist Custody | **$0 platform fee** | First 100 client accounts free; $1/month per account after 100 |
| **Standard** | Full Platform | **$1 per account/month** (after first 100) | Portfolio accounting, performance reporting, fee billing, client portal |
| **Enterprise** | Custom Pricing | **Contact sales** | Volume discounts, custom integrations, dedicated support |

**Notes on Pricing:**
- **First 100 accounts are complimentary** ($1 per account per month thereafter)
- **No platform fees** for Altruist brokerage accounts
- **Portfolio accounting software (PAS) fees eliminated** for accounts custodied with Altruist
- **Free tier includes:** Account opening, trading, portfolio management, reporting, and fee billing
- **Estimated cost savings:** $40-$70 per account per year vs traditional PAS providers (per Kitces)

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Custodial Services** - Self-clearing custodian for RIAs
- **Portfolio Management** - Rebalancing, tax-loss harvesting, fixed-income trading
- **Account Opening** - Digital ACATs, bulk onboarding, 30+ account types
- **Fee Billing** - Automated, customizable fee billing integrated into platform
- **Performance Reporting** - Custom performance reports without separate system
- **Client Portal** - Co-branded desktop and mobile experience

### Advanced Features
- **Hazel AI Platform** - AI that unifies custodial data, CRM, emails, and meeting notes
- **Model Marketplace** - 500+ models, 3x cheaper than average TAMP
- **Direct Indexing** - Personalized portfolios with tax optimization
- **High-Yield Cash** - 8x national average yield with FDIC insurance
- **FIX Trading Integration** - With Orion and Advyzon

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **Custom API Access** - For embedding workflows in custom applications
- **Dedicated Support** - U.S.-based experts available by phone
- **Volume Pricing** - Negotiated rates for large firms

### Limitations
- **Not a CRM** - Requires integration with external CRM systems
- **Not Financial Planning Software** - Must integrate with tools like MoneyGuidePro or eMoney
- **Primarily for RIAs** - May not suit all advisor business models

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### Hazel AI Platform
**What it does:** AI assistant that analyzes client data, CRM, emails, and notes to provide insights and automate workflows.

**Key Features:**
- Natural language queries for client portfolio analysis
- Automated meeting note generation and strategy drafting
- Tax planning recommendations based on client data
- Real-time custodial data integration

**Pricing:** Included with Altruist custody accounts

**Use Cases:**
- Client meeting preparation and follow-up
- Portfolio analysis and recommendations
- Tax planning and optimization
- Compliance and documentation

### Model Marketplace
**What it does:** Access to 500+ investment models and strategies integrated into Altruist's rebalancer.

**Key Features:**
- Turnkey asset management alternatives
- Direct indexing models
- ESG and thematic investing options
- Automated rebalancing integration

**Pricing:** Varies by model; generally 3x cheaper than average TAMP (0.45-0.50bps vs industry average)

**Use Cases:**
- Portfolio construction and management
- Tax-loss harvesting strategies
- Model-based investing without separate TAMP

### High-Yield Cash
**What it does:** Cash management solution offering 8x national average yield with FDIC insurance.

**Key Features:**
- Variable interest rates
- FDIC insurance through partner banks (up to $3M individual, $6M joint)
- No setup fees or draw fees

**Pricing:** No fees; competitive rates

**Use Cases:**
- Idle cash management for clients
- Emergency fund solutions
- Short-term cash needs

---

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 25+ across CRM, financial planning, and custodial systems

**Integration Types Available:**
- Native/First-Party Integrations
- API-Based Integrations
- Third-Party/Marketplace Integrations
- FIX Trading Integration

**Integration Directions:**
- Bidirectional (Altruist ↔ CRM/Planning)
- One-way (Data import into Altruist)
- One-way (Data export from Altruist)

---

## Key Integrations (5-7 Detailed)

### 1. Wealthbox CRM
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | Native/First-Party |
| **Direction** | Bidirectional |
| **What it does** | Allows advisors to access Altruist account balances, positions, and details directly within Wealthbox contact records. Streamlines data access and client management. |
| **Data synced** | Account balances, positions, client details, contact information |
| **Setup complexity** | Easy - Native integration |
| **Limitations** | Requires both Wealthbox and Altruist accounts |
| **Documentation** | [Wealthbox Altruist Integration](https://www.wealthbox.com/integrations/altruist/) |

### 2. Orion Portfolio Accounting
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | API-Based |
| **Direction** | Bidirectional |
| **What it does** | Real-time custodial integration that pipes Altruist data (accounts, households, holdings, balances) into Orion's reporting tool. Enables seamless view of Altruist custodial data within Orion. |
| **Data synced** | Household data, account data, position data, balance data |
| **Setup complexity** | Medium - API setup required |
| **Limitations** | Requires Orion subscription; some features may vary |
| **Documentation** | [Orion Altruist Integration](https://orion.com/integrations) |

### 3. Redtail CRM (Orion's Redtail)
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | API-Based |
| **Direction** | Bidirectional |
| **What it does** | Allows advisors to open accounts faster by pulling Redtail client data to pre-fill client details and demographics. Eliminates manual data entry during onboarding. |
| **Data synced** | Client demographics, contact info, account details |
| **Setup complexity** | Medium - API setup required |
| **Limitations** | Primarily for account opening workflow |
| **Documentation** | Announced via Wealth Management article (2023) |

### 4. MoneyGuidePro (MoneyGuide)
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | API-Based |
| **Direction** | Bidirectional |
| **What it does** | Integrates financial planning software with Altruist custodial data for comprehensive client planning. |
| **Data synced** | Account data, holdings, client information |
| **Setup complexity** | Medium - API setup required |
| **Limitations** | Requires MoneyGuidePro subscription |
| **Documentation** | Announced via Wealth Management article (2023) |

### 5. eMoney Financial Planning
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | API-Based |
| **Direction** | Bidirectional |
| **What it does** | Integrates eMoney's financial planning capabilities with Altruist custodial data. |
| **Data synced** | Account data, holdings, client information |
| **Setup complexity** | Medium - API setup required |
| **Limitations** | Requires eMoney subscription |
| **Documentation** | Announced via Wealth Management article (2023) |

### 6. Orion Advyzon Integration
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | FIX Trading Integration |
| **Direction** | One-way (Trading Execution) |
| **What it does** | Seamless FIX trading integration with Advyzon, offering modern, efficient, and fully digital trading experience. |
| **Data synced** | Trading orders, execution confirmations |
| **Setup complexity** | Hard - Requires FIX setup and configuration |
| **Limitations** | Requires Advyzon subscription and FIX setup |
| **Documentation** | [Altruist FIX Integration Announcement](https://altruist.com/news/fix-integration-orion-advyzon/) |

### 7. IncomeLab Life Hub
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | API-Based |
| **Direction** | Bidirectional |
| **What it does** | Integrates IncomeLab's Life Hub (client engagement platform) with Altruist custodial data. |
| **Data synced** | Account data, holdings, client information |
| **Setup complexity** | Medium - API setup required |
| **Limitations** | Requires IncomeLab subscription |
| **Documentation** | Announced via Wealth Management article (2023) |

## API & Developer Info

### API Availability
- **Yes, API available** for sophisticated clients with developers
- **Open API access** for embedding workflows
- **Custom API integration** for enterprise clients

### Developer Portal
- **API documentation** available upon request
- **Sandbox environment** for testing
- **Developer support** available for enterprise clients

### Rate Limits / Authentication
- **Authentication:** OAuth 2.0 or API key-based (varies by integration type)
- **Rate limits:** Not publicly disclosed; enterprise clients have negotiated limits
- **API access:** Primarily for account opening and data integration workflows

### Documentation Quality
- **Public documentation:** Limited; most detailed documentation requires account access
- **Integration documentation:** Available through integration partners
- **API documentation:** Provided to enterprise clients upon request

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros
1. **All-in-one platform** - Combines custody, portfolio management, billing, and reporting
2. **AI-powered** - Hazel AI provides unique capabilities for wealth management
3. **Cost-effective** - No platform fees; first 100 accounts free
4. **Modern technology** - Built from ground up for digital experience
5. **Extensive integrations** - 25+ integrations across major platforms
6. **Self-clearing custodian** - Full control over custodial operations
7. **Strong funding** - $290M+ in total funding, 4,000+ advisors served
8. **Regulatory compliance** - SEC, FINRA, OCC regulated, SIPC member
9. **Innovative features** - Direct indexing, model marketplace, high-yield cash
10. **Advisor-focused** - Built specifically for independent RIAs

### Cons
1. **Not a standalone solution** - Requires external CRM and financial planning tools
2. **Primarily for RIAs** - May not suit broker-dealers or other business models
3. **Limited public documentation** - Detailed docs require account access
4. **Newer entrant** - Less established than traditional custodians
5. **Integration complexity** - Some integrations require technical setup
6. **Account limits** - Free tier limited to first 100 accounts
7. **AI dependency** - Hazel AI features may not suit all advisor preferences
8. **Custom pricing** - Enterprise pricing not publicly disclosed
9. **Marketplace fees** - Model marketplace has variable fees per strategy
10. **Cash management limitations** - FDIC insurance spread across partner banks

### Alternatives
1. **Schwab Advisor Services** - Traditional custodian, more established
2. **Fidelity Institutional** - Full-service custodian with extensive integrations
3. **Pershing (BNY Mellon)** - Traditional custodian with global capabilities
4. **Envestnet** - Unified wealth management platform
5. **Orion** - Portfolio accounting and reporting (competitor in some areas)
6. **Advent/Black Diamond** - Portfolio management and reporting
7. **TIAA/Nuveen** - Full-service institutional custodian

### Use Cases

**Ideal For:**
- Independent RIAs (1-500 accounts)
- Advisors seeking modern, AI-forward platform
- Firms wanting to consolidate multiple systems
- RIAs focused on efficiency and cost reduction
- Advisors with existing CRM/planning software that integrates
- Startups or newer firms without legacy systems

**Not Ideal For:**
- Broker-dealers with specific regulatory requirements
- Large institutions requiring extensive customization
- Advisors without CRM/planning software (Altruist is not standalone)
- Firms with legacy systems that don't integrate
- Advisors seeking traditional custodial relationships only
- International advisors (primarily U.S.-focused)

### Key Differentiators
1. **AI-Forward Platform** - Hazel AI is unique among custodians
2. **True All-in-One** - Combines custody, portfolio management, billing, reporting
3. **Self-Clearing Custodian** - Full control over operations
4. **Cost Structure** - No platform fees; first 100 accounts free
5. **Modern Architecture** - Built from ground up for digital experience
